类 Point2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • Point2D

  • public class Point2D
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a 2D point. This point is denoted in Cartesian coordinates as (x,y).

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Point2D(double x, double y)
      Construct a 2d point with the given coordinates

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      double distToOrigin()
      Compute and return the Euclidean distance of this point to the origin
      double getX()
      Return the x-coordinate of this point
      double getY()
      Return the y-coordinate of this point

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Point2D

        public Point2D(double x,
               double y)
        Construct a 2d point with the given coordinates
        参数:
        x - the x-coordinate of this point
        y - the y-coordinate of this point

    • 方法详细资料

      • distToOrigin

        public double distToOrigin()
        Compute and return the Euclidean distance of this point to the origin
        返回:
        the euclidean distance

        public double getX()
        Return the x-coordinate of this point
        返回:

        Return the y-coordinate of this point
